response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item not only boasts a remarkable value of $15,000 to me but also comes with a unique set of features that could potentially be invaluable to you. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a purchase price of $14,500. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between rewarding the true worth of our product and presenting an attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 14500}
